name: Aibe seed
description: Dandelion-like flower whose seeds blow off on approach and affect intruders.

name: Anaitsa berry
description: Bush with bright yellow berries.

name: Black glove
description: Flower with black petals.

name: Che plat berry
description: Inanimate flowering vine with very many very thin white petals.

name: Chuche leaf
description: Tree with gum-like leaves.

name: Creampod seed
description: A small bush that grows ampoules that fill with a dairy-like substance, roughly half water. If fertilised, the ampoule drops off with the seed to help the new plant grow more easily.

name: Dabano berry
description: Inanimate vine with dark blue flowers and darker berries.

name: Golden lady
description: Five-petal flower with honey colouring.

name: Inha berry
description: Non-aggressive, with purple flowers and berries.

name: Likebane
description: Flower with yellow-and-grey petals.

name: Lover's kiss flower
description: Has orange flowers; twines around victims and locks them in enchanted sleep. (Soporific 1: take 1 Fatigue per hit.)

name: Merflower petal
description: Water lily with black and white petals.

name: Mie laz flower
description: With yellow flowers with contact toxin effect.

name: Mindai grass
description: Grass-like weed.

name: Mugibai nut
description: Tree with blue flowers.

name: Nejal berry
description: Bush like strawberry, small and red.

name: Oktar petal
description: A thorny purple flowering weed.

name: Sea glove
description: Fleshy plant, seaweed meets cactus.

name: Sea wort
description: Seaweed with red flowers.

name: Sujan petal
description: Flower with long pink-and-white petals.

name: Tebac petal
description: Oxalis-like flower with red petals. Instead of inflicting Injury if taken raw, causes addiction.

name: Tetan petal
description: Small red flower with orange spots.

name: Vichas flower
description: With black flowers and a contact neurotoxin.

name: Wrath lily petal
description: Scarlet flowers with large stamens that burst on approach, releasing wrath pollen.

name: Aokla
description: A fern that can be ingested directly and is a mild euphoriant.

name: Blast pod leaf
description: A pod that fills with something pressurised and explosive that goes off on contact. Farmed by kaiju as a cheap trap.

name: Carmineroot
description: Its roots are edible and grow profusely, extending beyond the reach of its vines.

name: Chokeweed leaf
description: Despite being technically cornucopic, is inedible to humans, so it's just an extremely prolific animate vine.

name: Dash corn
description: Much like maize, except that its ears grow absurdly fast (eg one per day); however, they rot just as fast.

name: Firelace
description: Pink flowers that burst into flame on contact.

name: Jepo weed
description: A tough grass.

name: Kaicheri leaf
description: Unaggressive, with broad leaves and small white flowers.

name: Maiden's touch
description: Unaggressive seaweed with long tendrils that drain magic on touch.

name: Saltweed leaf
description: A network of floating pond lily leaves connected by vines; they grow salty/sweet fruits

name: Blue cap
description: A mushroom with blue spots; quite toxic unless boiled.

name: Inzun
description: With yellow flowers that grow into red berries. The vines drain ability to use magic.

name: Glueshroom
description: A mushroom that secretes a powerful adhesive when squeezed.

name: Hezucoral
description: Plant that accretes minerals out of water and creates semi-mineral structural matrices. The foundation of most aquatic nexus; needs nexus magic to grow effectively.

name: Horizon mushroom
description: An extremely fast-growing mushroom that's quite nutritious.

name: Noi wan
description: A toadstool that twists gravity when stepped on; fully grown ones can launch a person into the air. Farmed by kaiju as low-effort ladders.

name: Pora stalk
description: A toadstool that's quite poisonous unless boiled.

name: Scarlet cap
description: A mushroom with a pure red top.

name: Sea reed stem
description: Like reeds, but salt tolerant.

name: Vampire bramble root
description: With thorns that inflict @bleeding@ on any hit.

name: Yunzo root
description: Grassy weed much like that stuff Fang said she made dumplings out of.

name: Bluewood sap
description: A tree with blue-tinged wood.

name: Crabweed sap
description: With bright pink flowers; grabs its victims' ankles and holds them there.

name: Honeycup honey
description: A flower that rapidly produces a cupful of honey.

name: Jaut sap
description: A very thorny tree, whose thorns often cause allergic reactions.

name: Kobal sap
description: A tree whose (mundane) fruit grows absurdly quickly

name: Modaga sap
description: A cactus-like plant. The sap is mildly hallucinogenic by itself.

name: Nezema resin
description: With broad leaves that secretes a very sticky resin that's an absolute bitch to get off.

name: Pilo sap
description: A woody shrub that grows hornet-like creatures that attack anyone who gets too close.

name: Shaika sap
description: A tree that grows fruits of many neighbouring species ("At least one of them has to work, right?").

name: Sea cap
description: A mushroom.

name: Stone root
description: A plant that incorporates rock into its structural matrix. Very tough, used by kaiju to build stuff. Uses a mixture of minerals: quartz, calcite, aragonite, hydroxyapatite, etc. Other plants grow in cracks, making it more of a biocomposite matrix.
